<head>
  <style>
        /* Title Container Styling */
        .title-container {
        width: 40%;
        height: auto;

        background-color: transparent !important;
        background-size: cover;
        background-position: center;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        color: rgba(0, 100, 250, 0.8);
        font-size: 1em;

        border: none;
        }

<head>
  <style>
    /* Reset default margins & paddings */
    * {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        
    }

    html, body {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        overflow-x: hidden;
        scroll-behavior: smooth; /* Optional: Smooth scrolling */
    }
    

    /* Make the image scroll without needing extra content */
    body {
        background-image: url('images/ki-capa.jpg'); /* Update with your image path */
        background-size: cover;
        background-position: top;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-attachment: scroll; /* Make the image scroll */
        color: white;
        font-size: 2em;
        text-shadow: 2px 2px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
        height: 100vh; /* Create scrolling effect without extra content */
        overflow-y: scroll; /* Enable vertical scrolling */
        class="main-content"
    }
  </style>
</head>
